[Photosensitivity Warning  ----  Motion Sickness Warning  <3]

[Controls]

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump
R - Respawn

[Gameplay]
Destroy all Chaos Crystals in this Illusion-Filled world. Shoot your way Through waves of Enemies while Platforming your way to each area!
